rationale: 'spreads easily' does not contain an intensifier + risk-adjective. 'high-level' modifies 'protocol'.
statement_text: The virus [H5N1] spreads easily from wild bird droppings and can be carried into commercial flocks on the feet of workers or on equipment, which is why high-level biosecurity protocol has been activated across the country in commercial operations.
